question: Help! Someone help me! Is someone there? Hey! Shit, Im probably dead.
answer: Youre not dead.

question: Whos that? Whos that?!
answer: Theres no point in yelling, I already tried it.

question: Turn on the lights!
answer: Would if I could.

question: What the fuck is going on? Where am I?
answer: I dont know yet.

question: What is that smell?
answer: Shh! Hang on a second, I think I found something.

question: Holy shit! HELP!!! HELP!!! Help!
answer: No one can hear you.

question: What the fuck is this?
answer: Calm down, just calm down. Are you hurt?

question: I dont know...yeah!
answer: Whats your name?

question: My name is Very Fucking Confused! Whats your name? Whats going on here?
answer: My name is Lawrence Gordon, Im a doctor. I just woke up here, just like you.

question: Ah!
answer: Recognize him?

question: No.
answer: Well, do you have any idea how you got here?

question: No.
answer: Whats the last thing you remember?

question: Nothing. I went to bed in my shithole apartment, and woke up in an actual shithole. So what about you, huh?
answer: Well theres...theres not much to tell, really. I was on my way home from work and uh, I dont remember anything else.

question: First dead body Ive ever seen. Look different in real life. They dont move.
answer: From the looks of these chains, someone didnt want us to go very far either.

question: Can you see any scars?
answer: What?

question: Huh? This is what they do man, They kidnap you and drug you and before you know it, youre in a bathtub and your kidneys are on eBay.
answer: No one has taken your kidneys.

question: How can you tell from way over there?
answer: Because youd either be in terrible agony, or youd be dead by now. Trust me.

question: What are you, a surgeon?
answer: Yeah. So, you gonna tell me your name, or what?

question: Adam.
answer: Well Adam, what we need to do is start thinking about why were here. Whoever brought us there couldve killed us by now. But they didnt. They must want something from us. Question is what. That clock.

question: What about it?
answer: Its brand new.

question: So?
answer: So, someone obviously wanted us to know the time. Wait, I think I may be able to reach that door. What is that? Excuse me.

question: Its a tape.
answer: Where did you find it?

question: It was in my pocket. It says Play me.
answer: Come on, come on, come on....

question: Throw it over here. Fuck.
answer: No? Use your shirt.

question: What?
answer: Your shirt. Come on...

question: It wont work.
answer: Well, look around, there must be something else you can use.

question: Theres nothing.
answer: Well there must be something! Come on, you can do it. Come on, come on, again.

question: I dont get it.
answer: Throw me the player.

question: No, you throw me your tape.
answer: Look, were going to have to work together if we want to get out of here. Now just throw it to me.

question: What the hell does Follow your heart mean?
answer: There! Right next to you, on the toilet. Come on, come on.

question: Oh man...(he gasps, making gagging sounds, his face turned away from the bowl. He coughs, fishes around for another brief moment, then quickly pulls back, trying to shake some of the shit off of his hand, spitting.
answer: Anything?

question: No solids.
answer: Take off the lid. Come on!

question: I really wish I had checked in there first.
answer: Huh. What is it? Hey! Mind passing me the other one?

question: Fuck! Fuck!
answer: He doesnt want us to cut through our chains. He wants us to cut through our feet. I think I may know whos done this to us.

question: What did you say?
answer: Its not someone I know personally. Its...just someone I know of.

question: Jesus Christ! Tell me, who is it?!
answer: The last I heard...the police still hadnt caught him. And the only reason I know that is because I was a suspect. Ill start from the beginning.

question: Thank you for that information, Zep. As you can see, our orderlies form very special bonds with the patients. Continuing on, the patient.... Obviously someone doesnt want me to tell you what the patient has. Excuse me.
answer: Dr. Gordon, Im Detective Tapp, this is Detective Sing, City Homicide. Very impressive.

question: Oh. Thank you, I do my best.
answer: Sorry to interrupt you while youre working.

question: Thats fine. Now, how can I help you gentlemen?
answer: Are you able to tell us where you were between the hours of 11:00 p.m. and 1:00 a.m. last night, Doctor?

question: Why is it that youre interested?
answer: Wed like to ask you a few questions about it. For your sake, I think its best if we do it down at the station. Would you like to follow us there?

question: Of course not! I was seeing someone. I was visiting someone. It wasnt a patient. Alright? What am I gonna do? That was five months ago. He tried to set me up for murder.
answer: Okay. We checked your alibi. It holds up.

question: Good! Can I go home now?
answer: We have one of the victims who managed to escape. Want to know if you wouldnt mind sticking around and listening to her testimony? Maybe itll trigger something.

question: Id like to help, really, but...
answer: Well, wed really appreciate it. Shes the only one who made it.

question: Are you sure its him?
answer: Yeah, Im sure.

question: How do I know youre telling the truth? You can be the one who put me in this room!
answer: Im in exactly the same situation youre in.

question: Wrong. Wrong! Youve got one thing I dont
answer: What?

question: Its a two-way mirror. So thats what this is. Reality TV. Can you hear me in there? Huh? Im having a blast. This is the most fun Ive had without lubricant. Make sure youre getting everything.
answer: Thats not going to do anything.

question: You just want to leave it running on us?
answer: Well, you wont stop it. Thats why we cant cut through these chains. Its why you wont break that glass. Every possible angle has been pre-thought out by him.

question: You sound like you admire this prick.
answer: To overcome something, you have to understand what a perfect engine it is. Thats how you fight disease. Now the tape told us to find an X. That X has to be somewhere in this room. Help me find it.

question: How can you be the calm Doctor Guy when your wife and kid are out there. Hes got them, too. He could be doing anything to them right now. Are you thinking about that?
answer: I AM thinking about that. Ive been the last thing I said to my daughter.

question: Diana, Honey, are you okay? Diana, Honey, can you hear me?
answer: Mommy?

question: Oh, what is it, sweet pea?
answer: Theres a man in my room.

question: Oh Honey, are you sure hes not just hiding in your imagination?
answer: He talked to me.

question: Okay, Ill come and check your room.
answer: I want Daddy. Hell get the scary man.

question: Alright, if you want. Come on. Larry, sorry to bother you, but your daughter had a bad dream again.
answer: Just a minute.

question: She wants you to check her room.
answer: Mmm hmm, mmm hmm, just gotta finish this paragraph.

question: You know what sweetie? Ill go check with you.
answer: Nope! Im done. See? Theres no one in your room. Theres no such thing as the bad man. Now can you go to sleep?

question: Nope! Im done. See? Theres no one in your room. Theres no such thing as the bad man. Now can you go to sleep?
answer: Im still scared.

question: You are? Give me your tootsie. Oh, what a big tootsie. Remember this one? This little piggy went to market, this little piggy stayed home, this little piggy had roast beef, this little piggy had none, and this little piggy went Weeee! all the way home!
answer: I hate that thing.

question: Well I have to go to work, sweetheart. You know what Daddys job is like. Now, come on. Lets see. Try and get some sleep now, okay?
answer: Youre not going to leave us, are you, Daddy?

question: What? What are you talking about? You mean, leave you and Mommy? No, no sweetheart, I would never do that. Who gave you that idea?
answer: No one.

question: Well its not true, okay?
answer: Okay.

question: How much do I love you? Thats right, thats right! Good night, sweetie.
answer: Good night, Daddy.

question: Tomorrow, Ill read you your favourite story.
answer: Okay.

question: Okay.
answer: I dont know how much longer I can do this, Larry.

question: What, what are you talking about?
answer: How can you walk through life pretending that youre happy?

question: I am happy.
answer: That is complete bullshit. Id rather you break down and tell me that you hated me. At least thered be some passion in it.

question: Would you like to see her? (He reaches into his pocket and takes out his wallet, throws it across the room to Adam, who is sitting with his back against the wall, facing Lawrence. Adam picks up the wallet and opens it. He sees two pictures of Diana, side by side. The one on the left is Diana hugging a dog. The one on the right is a smiling portrait outside somewhere.
answer: Shes beautiful.

question: Thank you.
answer: You gonna have any more kids?

question: Weve talked about it, but uh, with our schedules, its difficult enough to concentrate on one.
answer: So wheres the lucky wife?

question: Its uh, its not here.
answer: What?

question: Uh, this photo youre talking about...its not here.
answer: Really? Are you sure?

question: Yeah.
answer: He...he mustve taken it. I...

question: He...he mustve taken it. I...
answer: How can you walk through life pretending that youre happy?

question: I am happy.
answer: That is complete bullshit. Id rather you break down and tell me that you hated me. At least thered be some passion in it.

question: We can talk about this alter, okay?
answer: Just leave. Diana!? Diana! (opens the door and flips on the light, gasps when she sees a figure covered by a blanket looming over Dianas bed. The figure suddenly grabs Diana and she screams, struggling against him. Alison goes for them. Dont do that! Leave her! Get away from her! Keep your motherfucking hands off of my daughter!

question: Hey Tapp?
answer: Mmm?

question: Were gonna go down to the Grill, go get a beer. You wanna come?
answer: I dont think so. Thanks anyway.

question: You know I always ask.
answer: There is only one key...

question: Ill leave you to have fun up here.
answer: Its in the stomach of your dead cellmate.

question: Hey Tapp? I dont mean for this to be disrespectful... Maybe you should find yourself a girlfriend.
answer: Its in the stomach of your dead cellmate. Look around, Amanda. Know that Im not lying. You better hurry up.

question: Wait wait wait, Sing! Get back here!
answer: What?

question: Mmm!
answer: What?

question: Remember 118th Street?
answer: Ah...K2K. That gangs territory was only about four blocks.

question: Now listen to this. We gotta check the records from all the fire emergencies that occurred there in the last two weeks. Go, right now! Mmm!
answer: On the night of Tuesday, the 17th, we got a fire alarm going off in the rear wing of 213 Stygian Street. Its an old listing. Used to be a mannequin factory. You think we have enough for a warrant, though?

question: Who said anything about a warrant?
answer: Right now?

question: Why not?
answer: Yeah, why not? (He grabs his gun, snaps a cartridge into it, grabsup his coat, and quickly follows Tapp.

question: At least well have the cover of darkness.
answer: Yeah, well, so will anybody else.

question: I got you... What the hell is this?....... Oh shit...
answer: Oh fuck!

question: Wait Sing!
answer: What?

question: Lets see what hes gonna do.
answer: Why? Weve fucking got him.

question: We dont know what he looks like. Lets see what hes gonna do.
answer: No fucking way!

question: Sing, Sing!
answer: Fuck that. Im gonna take him.

question: Sing!
answer: What the fuck? Shit!

question: Shut up and get down here!
answer: What did you do? Turn it off!

question: Sing, stop that thing! Im taking this bastard down. Move!
answer: How do you turn it off?!

question: Tell him which key it is!
answer: Time is running out.

question: Shut up and get down here right now, asshole!
answer: Whats more important to you Officer, arresting me or the life of another human being?

question: X Marks the spot... X marks the spot...we need to search this room again. What are you doing over there? Excuse me?
answer: Just because Im stuck in this room with you doesnt mean I have to report to you every ten seconds.

question: I really dont see the point in us not helping one another.
answer: well what do you want me to do? Im on a leash.

question: Thats exactly why we need to talk. We need to think!
answer: I am thinking!

question: Well then dont keep me in the dark about what youre thinking!
answer: Turn off the lights.

question: What?
answer: Turn them off now, please!

question: Why?
answer: Just turn them off for a second! Jesus, behind you!

question: How come we didnt see that before?
answer: The lights in here hadnt charged it. It must be glow in the dark paint or something. Open it!

question: Its locked. The key, the one from my envelope. Where is it?
answer: Where the fuck...Here. Cell phone. The most beautiful invention on this planet! Make that second most beautiful invention! Give me that.

question: Are you joking? Youre gonna put something we found in this room in your mouth?
answer: Yes, Im willing to risk it! Give me that sweet cancer. I dont care, I really dont. Give me one of those.

question: May I please have a cigarette?
answer: Im trying the police. Shit. This was meant to receive calls, not make them. Wait a minute...this has happened before. Last night, after I finished at the hospital. I was walking back to my car. I thought I was alone, but Im sure someone else was there. That...thing. It was waiting for me. How did you know to turn off the lights?

question: Who cares? It worked.
answer: Yeah, but how did you know?

question: Instinct.
answer: Instinct?

question: Yeah.
answer: You know what? Youre a terrible liar.

question: You say that like you know me.
answer: What else arent you telling me?

question: Well, um, lets see. On my sixth birthday, my best friend at that time, Scott Tibbs, stabbed me with a rusty nail. I didnt tell you about that. I didnt tell you that my last girlfriend, who was a feminist vegan punk, broke up with me because she thought I was too angry. Uh, I havent told you that one of my toenails is slightly...
answer: Just stop it. You knew to turn off these lights.

question: What-ever.
answer: Im dealing with a juvenile.

question: You wanna know?
answer: Yeah!

question: Here it is.
answer: Oh God... W...where did you get this?

question: It was in your wallet, behind the photo of your daughter.
answer: W...why didnt you show me this before?

question: I couldnt. Im sorry.
answer: What are you doing to them you bastard?! Okay...okay.. Okay, Ive got to think now...

question: What are you doing? Hey! What the hell are you doing?
answer: Adam, listen to me. I want you to play along with me on this. You got that? (he turns the lights back on, both of them again wincing at the bright light. Lawrence glances at the surveillance camera, then looks to Adam. So you uh, still want that cigarette?

question: Um...yeah, sure.
answer: There! Ive done it! Ive killed him with the poison, just like you wanted. Now wheres my family?! Where are they?!

question: Jesus Christ!!
answer: What?

question: I just got electrocuted!
answer: What? That was our way out!

question: Did you hear what I said? Get this thing off me! Get it off!
answer: Stop acting!

question: You think I would make that up just to mess up your stupid fucking charade?
answer: All right, thats it! Ah, Damn it!!

question: I remember everything now. I remember how I got here. Great. Is someone there? I can hear you. What the...? Christ! What the... Who is that?! Whos in there?! Come on out! Ill kill you, you motherfucker!
answer: Who is this?

question: Who is this?
answer: Daddy?

question: Diana?
answer: Daddy, is that you?

question: Yeah baby, its me. Im here.
answer: Im scared, Daddy.

question: Dont worry honey, everythings going to be okay. Wheres Mommy?
answer: Shes here with me.

question: Let me talk to her sweetie, okay? Put Mommy on.
answer: The bad man from my room is here. He has us tied up and he has a gun.

question: W...what man?
answer: Please come home Daddy!

question: Hello? Hello? Diana? Diana! Diana!
answer: Larry?

question: Ally? Is that you?
answer: Is Adam there?

question: How do you know? Ally, what is going on?
answer: Dont believe Adams lies. He knows you. He knew all about you before today.

question: Hello? Ally? Ally? Hello? God damn you! If you so much as lay a finger on them, Ill kill you! You hear me? You son of a bitch! Ill kill you!
answer: Are they okay?

question: My wife, she uh, she mentioned your name.
answer: What did she say?

question: She told me...not to believe you.
answer: Believe me about what?

question: She told me you knew me. Who are you?
answer: You know who I am.

question: Stop the lies! Youre a liar! I need to know the truth!
answer: Im a liar? What did you do last night, Lawrence? Work at a hospital? Saving sick children? You told me that after you left your house last night, you went to work at a hospital.

question: Thats because its the truth.
answer: No its not. Your wife is right, Larry. You dont recall getting your picture taken in that parking lot? I can prove that you didnt go anywhere near a hospital last night. Its not the first time Ive done it either, Larry. Ive been taking pictures of you for a few days now.

question: But...why?
answer: You wanna know what I do? I get paid to take pictures of rich guys like you who go to seedy, out-of-the-way motels to fuck their secretaries. Last night I went to your house. I watched you leave. I followed you all the way to that shitbag hotel.

question: Youve uh, had these with you the whole time?
answer: I found them, in there with the hacksaws. I dont know how they got there.

question: Yeah, right. Youre so full of it!
answer: Aww, face it, Larry, were both bulls hitters. But my camera isnt. It doesnt know how to lie. It only shows you whats put right in front of it. Just out of curiosity, what did you do in that motel room? You got out of there pretty fast.

question: Why did you um, deem it necessary to page me when you knew I was at home?
answer: I didnt know if you were going to make it.

question: But I gave you a precise time at which to page me. You cant do that.
answer: Its not like I know the rules for this sort of stuff. Whats wrong, Dr. Gordon?

question: Look, it was wrong for me to makes you come here.
answer: But I thought we-

question: -Please. Im sorry. You tell anyone you were here?
answer: No. Hello? Its for you.

question: For me? Hello? I- I have to go.
answer: What happened?

question: Ive got to go. (He picks up his briefcase from the chair, and heads out the door. Who was it?
answer: Who was what?

question: The person who paid you to follow me, who was it?
answer: He calls himself Bob and he gives me the money up front. Two hundred bucks a night. If Id have known I was gonna end up here, I wouldve asked for a hell of a lot more.

question: What does that mean? Does that mean you saw what happened to me?
answer: What I saw was you get into your car. Thats it. I didnt ask your name. I didnt know who you were. I dont know how I got here, I dont know how you got here. I just took the shots and went straight home to develop the. Next thing I know Im chained to a pipe in some prehistoric bathroom, staring at the guy Ive been taking shots of all night.

question: Clearly, whoever paid you to take the pictures of me is the one who put is in here.
answer: Maybe.

question: Maybe? What do you mean maybe? Of course it is! What did he look like?
answer: I dont know, he was just a guy.

question: Was he tall, was he skinny, obese, what?
answer: I dont take notes about his appearance.

question: You must remember something about him.
answer: I cant.

question: Youre telling me you dont remember a thing about the guy?
answer: I told you, I-

question: Oh for fucks sake! I give up!
answer: Hes a tall black guy, hes got a scar around his neck, okay?

question: Tapp! Detective Tapp!
answer: Whoa, the guy who paid me to take these photos was not a cop.

question: No, no, he was discharged from the police force. He broke down after his partner was killed , but that didnt stop him from harassing me. The guy became obsessed. Hes convinced himself that I must have somehow been involved with the murders. Hes...hes crazy. And you helped him. You took money from him to invade my privacy. How could you do that?
answer: Call it my need to eat.

question: Right, right. You know what Adam? Youre not a victim of this game, youre a part of it.
answer: Oh really? Obviously this cop thinks youre the one behind it all.

question: I told you, hes not a cop. Hes a bottom feeder, just like you.
answer: What are you more pissed off about? The fact that I took some shots of you or the fact that I took some shots of you while you were cheating on your wife?

question: I did not cheat on her!!!
answer: What do you care what I think anyway? I dont give a crap if you covered yourself in peanut butter and had a 15-hooker gang bang!

question: Hey, was there someone else at your house last night besides your wife and daughter?
answer: No.

question: Well, theres someone here.
answer: I know him. Zep! His name is Zep. Hes an orderly at my hospital. Zep. You perverted little psychopath. Im gonna take great pleasure in seeing you pay for this! You bastard fuck!

question: Is that you Zep, you bastard!? I know its you, you son of a bitch!
answer: Larry?

question: Ally?
answer: You failed.

question: Hello? Hello?
answer: Dont move, stay on the ground. Give me the phone. Give it to me! Larry?

question: Ally! Honey, are you all right?
answer: No! No were not... Get down! Larry, where are you?

question: I dont know. Im being held captive in a room somewhere.
answer: What? What are you talking about?

question: Im so sorry, Ally.
answer: Honey, we need you here.

question: Lawrence! Lawrence, get up! Lawrence! Get up! I need you! Oh, thank God! I thought you were dead!
answer: He...he electrocuted me...

question: I told you! The same thing happened to me, see? I wasnt lying, see?
answer: FUCK THIS SHIT!! No!!!!

question: Lawrence, calm down. There must be a way out of this!
answer: I cant be calm! My family needs me! No, God!

question: Lawrence, stop it! Lawrence, please calm down! Theres a way out of here, theres a way out! Lawrence! No! Oh my God! What are you doing?! What are you doing?! What are you... Oh my God! Oh my God! Lawrence dont! No! Lawrence, please, Im begging you! Lawrence, its not me who did this to you!
answer: You have to die.

question: No, I want to live!
answer: Im sorry...

question: I want to live!
answer: My family... Ive done it! Now show them to me!

question: You bastard! Ill fucking kill you! Ill fucking kill you! You fucking bastard! Ill fucking kill you! You fucking bastard! Ill fucking kill you! Ill fucking kill you!
answer: Youre too late.

question: Why?
answer: Its the rules.
